document.full_text: singapore police said on thursday they are investigating a report lodged by the asian golf tour alleging their former finance and human resources manager had gone missing and a sum of money was unaccounted for.
document.title: investigation underway after asian tour police report
lines_and_colors: singapore police said on thursday they are investigating a report lodged by the asian golf tour alleging their former finance and human resources manager had gone missing and a sum of money was unaccounted for.
